abstract: In the program, customers can select from among 40,000 items online. Then they will receive a text message or e-mail alerting them when the order is ready.
snippet: In the program, customers can select from among 40,000 items online. Then they will receive a text message or e-mail alerting them when the order is ready.
lead_paragraph: Now that they have pushed online sales for several years, retailers are trying to figure out how to use online sales to spur in-store sales.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Has a Web Plan to Bolster In-Store Sales
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Has a Web Plan To Bolster In-Store Sales
